metadata.name: The Lone Wanderer
metadata.description:
"The Lone Wanderer" : A minimal piece, depicting a lone figure walking through an abandoned urban landscape. The minimalist style and desolate setting hint at the idea that the truth can be hard to find, but that it's worth the effort to seek it out.

Name: The Lone Wanderer
Artist: Shivayy
Collection Name: Minimal Archives
Edition type: 1/1
Year: 2023
Dimensions: 3465x3465
